snippet: It’s a good thing that Asian countries are at the London Games: They’ve provided nearly all the colorful moments to an Olympics that has amounted, so far, to a lot of gray.
abstract: It’s a good thing that Asian countries are at the London Games: They’ve provided nearly all the colorful moments to an Olympics that has amounted, so far, to a lot of gray.

headline.main: Asia Brings Drama to an Otherwise Drab Olympics
